_header: Here lieth the fresh flower of Plantagenet
_description: Epitaph on Queen Elizabeth, wife of Henry VII — nine couplets

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Here lith the fresshe flowr of PlantagenetHere lith the white rose
                    in the rede sete…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…God grant her now hevyn to encrese& owr kyng Harry long
                    lyff & peaseExplicit
